channel.title: The original dodian is back
channel.description:
[center][i][b]Hey guys Paul here the Advertising Specialist for the return of *
Dodian is back and its better than ever.[/b][/i]
[u][i][b]OUR COMMUNITY[/b][/i][/u]
[i][b]We have a great player base in game , and on the forums. We have alot of friendly people, and there is still always room for friendly competition in game, where it be going for a number 1 spot in a skill, or staking other players to make bank.[/b][/i] [u] [i][b]OUR FORUMS[/b][/i][/u]
[i][b]The forums have a nice simple layout, that is easy to use and navigate. There are many sections available with many topics made to add your own insight too, whether you play in game or just like using the forums we have a place for all. Come join our forums at www.Dodian.net and introduce yourself to the great community that is Dodian.[/b][/i]
[u][i][b]OUR STAFF[/b][/i][/u]
[i][b]We have a great staff here at dodian. All the Administrators, and mods are very helpful as our some of our normal players as well. They are very active and are always willing to stop what they are doing the lend assistance if needed. Our new owner is Boxhad, he was given ownership by the previous owner Surface, who just had too many IRL priorites to attend to, So in order to keep the community growing and successful he handed over ownership to Boxhad, who is also our leading content developer.[/b][/i]
[u][i][b]SERVER UPDATES[/b][/i][/u]
[i][b]There has been new items added , all your favorite bosses are back, and we even have introduced DUO SLAYER!!!!
Tired of slaying by yourself, wish you had a friend with you? Try out DUO SLAYER!!!! You each get the same task at a higher amount of monsters to kill, work together to beat them all. While in a duo slayer task you also gain 1.25x the normal exp rate.
We have a new homepage layout as well as updates every week. Our next event is going to be on Thanksgiving.
On Halloween we just introduced masks into the server, so at around Christmas time phats may be introduced into the game so there is still time to get rares in Dodian.
[b][i][u][color=red]THE IN GAME BOSSES[/color][/u][/i][/b]
Here I will give you a description of the bosses in the game, how to get to them , and their most known drops. These bosses are alot of fun, and they actually do damage back to make them challenging.
Dad - He drops rune armour and weapons as well as the Red Key (which you use to get to Santojalon. Dad is located in west Yanille
Santojolan - He drops dragon weapons and armour , legends cape , the orange key (which is used to get to The Black Knight Titan) as well as a ship ticket (used to get to the new boss Slash Bash) He is located downstairs in the house located next to the smithing house in Yanille.
Black Knight Titan - He drops Dragon 2h sword , obsidian cape , glory amulet as well as a ship ticket (used to get to the new boss Slash Bash). He is located past the monkey bars downstairs in the house located next to the smithing house in Yanille.
Ungadulu - He drops full mime wardrobe , archer helmet and the beserker helmet as well as other drops. He is located in south Taverly.
Ice Queen - She drops crystal bow , crystal shield and has a 100% drop rate of (50) blood runes. She is located inside of White Wolf Mountain.
Nechryeal - He drops the all powerful Skeletal armour , as well as granite maul, the whip as well as a 100% drop rate of 30k coins. as well as a ship ticket (used to get to the new boss Slash Bash). Hes located in the premium only area under the Legends Guild.
Slash Bash - One of the more powerful bosses in the game , he drops the fury , the anger sword and the anger spear as well as a 100% drop rate of 30k coins.
Thanks to Xarieste, and Skilly Slack who gave me some ideas to put in this advertisement.
PLEASE BE SURE TO PUT THE NAME PAUL UNDER WHO REFERRED YOU ID APPRECIATE IT VERY MUCH.
Here are just a few pictures of the server there is plenty more come check us out!
[/b][/i]
[URL=https://imageshack.com/i/knByJcinp][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/743/ByJcin.png[/img][/URL] [URL=https://imageshack.com/i/ipOONvHZp][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/673/OONvHZ.png[/img][/URL] [URL=https://imageshack.com/i/pat0Pn47p][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/910/t0Pn47.png[/img][/URL] [URL=https://imageshack.com/i/iqoqnh2yp][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/674/oqnh2y.png[/img][/URL] [URL=https://imageshack.com/i/ipXI7RO2p][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/673/XI7RO2.png[/img][/URL] [URL=https://imageshack.com/i/ipo4b3oNp][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/673/o4b3oN.png[/img][/URL] [URL=https://imageshack.com/i/f0EgOYz0p][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/540/EgOYz0.png[/img][/URL] [URL=https://imageshack.com/i/iqi9fF7Mp][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/xq90/674/i9fF7M.png[/img][/URL][/center]

item.title: The original dodian is back
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

You need to be the owner of a server in order to advertise it on these forums, sorry. If your server’s owner would like to make a new thread he’s free to.

Read full topic

item.title: The original dodian is back
item.dc:creator: @Dodian2014 Dodian2014
item.description:
@Dodian2014 wrote:

[center][i][b]Hey guys Paul here the Advertising Specialist for the return of *

Dodian is back and its better than ever.[/b][/i]

OUR COMMUNITY

We have a great player base in game , and on the forums. We have alot of friendly people, and there is still always room for friendly competition in game, where it be going for a number 1 spot in a skill, or staking other players to make bank.

OUR FORUMS

The forums have a nice simple layout, that is easy to use and navigate. There are many sections available with many topics made to add your own insight too, whether you play in game or just like using the forums we have a place for all. Come join our forums at www.Dodian.net and introduce yourself to the great community that is Dodian.

OUR STAFF

We have a great staff here at dodian. All the Administrators, and mods are very helpful as our some of our normal players as well. They are very active and are always willing to stop what they are doing the lend assistance if needed. Our new owner is Boxhad, he was given ownership by the previous owner Surface, who just had too many IRL priorites to attend to, So in order to keep the community growing and successful he handed over ownership to Boxhad, who is also our leading content developer.

SERVER UPDATES

[i][b]There has been new items added , all your favorite bosses are back, and we even have introduced DUO SLAYER!!!

Tired of slaying by yourself, wish you had a friend with you? Try out DUO SLAYER!!! You each get the same task at a higher amount of monsters to kill, work together to beat them all. While in a duo slayer task you also gain 1.25x the normal exp rate.

We have a new homepage layout as well as updates every week. Our next event is going to be on Thanksgiving.

On Halloween we just introduced masks into the server, so at around Christmas time phats may be introduced into the game so there is still time to get rares in Dodian.

[color=red]THE IN GAME BOSSES[/color]

Here I will give you a description of the bosses in the game, how to get to them , and their most known drops. These bosses are alot of fun, and they actually do damage back to make them challenging.

Dad - He drops rune armour and weapons as well as the Red Key (which you use to get to Santojalon. Dad is located in west Yanille

Santojolan - He drops dragon weapons and armour , legends cape , the orange key (which is used to get to The Black Knight Titan) as well as a ship ticket (used to get to the new boss Slash Bash) He is located downstairs in the house located next to the smithing house in Yanille.

Black Knight Titan - He drops Dragon 2h sword , obsidian cape , glory amulet as well as a ship ticket (used to get to the new boss Slash Bash). He is located past the monkey bars downstairs in the house located next to the smithing house in Yanille.

Ungadulu - He drops full mime wardrobe , archer helmet and the beserker helmet as well as other drops. He is located in south Taverly.

Ice Queen - She drops crystal bow , crystal shield and has a 100% drop rate of (50) blood runes. She is located inside of White Wolf Mountain.

Nechryeal - He drops the all powerful Skeletal armour , as well as granite maul, the whip as well as a 100% drop rate of 30k coins. as well as a ship ticket (used to get to the new boss Slash Bash). Hes located in the premium only area under the Legends Guild.

Slash Bash - One of the more powerful bosses in the game , he drops the fury , the anger sword and the anger spear as well as a 100% drop rate of 30k coins.

Thanks to Xarieste, and Skilly Slack who gave me some ideas to put in this advertisement.

PLEASE BE SURE TO PUT THE NAME PAUL UNDER WHO REFERRED YOU ID APPRECIATE IT VERY MUCH.

Here are just a few pictures of the server there is plenty more come check us out!

[/b][/i]
